name: Psi-Reflector
effectText: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Assault Mode Activate" or 1 card that mentions it from your Deck to your hand, except "Psi-Reflector". You can reveal 1 "Assault Mode Activate" in your hand, then target 1 monster in your GY that mentions it, except "Psi-Reflector"; Special Summon it, and if you do, increase its Level by up to 4. You can only use each effect of "Psi-Reflector" once per turn.
